snippet: The Crown Prosecution Service said enough evidence had been gathered to prosecute the official, Nigel Evans of the Conservative Party, for eight offenses.
abstract: Nigel Evans, conservative member of Britain's Parliament, is charged with several accounts of sexual assault as well as rape.
lead_paragraph: The Crown Prosecution Service said enough evidence had been gathered to prosecute the official, Nigel Evans of the Conservative Party, for eight offenses.

headline.main: Britain: Legislator Is Charged With Sexual Assault and Rape
headline.print_headline: Britain: Legislator Is Charged With Sexual Assault and Rape
